Stars are earned when your fans send gifts to you. The more you have, means the more popular you are! These Stars can be converted to Gems or be withdrawn as rewards.

Gems enables you to buy gifts for your favourite broadcasters, allowing them to give you more attention as they acknowledge you as their top fans (To send gifts, you can go to their Profile page or their livestreams).
